content: **mayflower crochet throw blanket pattern** this warm soft and reversible blanket is the perfect fall or holiday accent it features a beautiful stitch pattern resembling autumn leaves finished with an elegant edging a stunning addition to your fall or thanksgiving decor the pattern is easy to follow and works up quickly especially with #5 bulky yarn for fuller leaves however you can use any yarn weight as stitch counts for repeats are included allowing you to adjust the length and width as needed with detailed step-by-step written instructions and a helpful photo tutorial you ll have everything you need to create this cozy and stylish throw it s a wonderful project to bring warmth and seasonal charm to any space **pattern attributes** - the pattern is simple complete detailed and thoroughly tested - written in us terms - skill level intermediate - size 41 in width x 50 in length can be made in any size with instructions included - yarn type # 5 bulky weight yarn you can use #4 medium weight yarn if you prefer - crochet hook k 6 5 mm **pattern includes** - step-by-step detailed written instructions - high quality photo tutorial
